projects.title: Pivot Table on Dashboard
projects.description: No more heavy .xls and outdated pivot table on Excel. We introduced a completely customizable table settings so that users can re-create rows and columns for their various reporting needs. No manual sync required once the data source is connected.

projects.title: Chat and Comments
projects.description: This project aimed to provide a collaborative spirit to the numbers-driven dashboard by introducing a 'Comments' section. Users read numbers in order to communicate with others and take actions, so what if this can be done on our product page, instead of on emails/Slack?

projects.title: Multi-PG Payment System
projects.description: My team and I built a comphrehensive payment system that charges a fixed service fee based on ad spent, or a recurring subscription model, depending on the purchased product. Credit score per user is introduced to minimize risks, and so is cash credits to maximise cash flow. Photo by Stripe.
